text: Devadas Kapikad is a Tulu film and theatre actor, director, writer, producer, lyricist and singer. He has also acted in some Kannada films. He owns a drama troupe called Cha-parka. He has written and directed more than 45 dramas in Tulu language. His son Arjun Kapikad is also an actor. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Title !Director !Notes |- |2009 |Venkata in Sankata |Ramesh Arvind |Kannada Film |- |2012 |Telikeda Bolli |P. H.
